name: A Thief Story (Demo)
description:
A Thief Story is a small platform game where you'll incarnate a young tomb raider though Dolorous Gard, a cursed vampire mansion, home of the powerful Isabella Von Frank. It's corridors, filled with dangerous tramps and befouled creatures, ready to end the life of anyone who dares intrusing their home. Defeat the evil vampire lady and scape with all the treasure you can before you get trapped for all eternity between the mansion's wall.

* All feedback is welcome to continue developing this game! *
